ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of the Staff Table, a table where you can create energy staves. As well as the construction of basic energy staves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of fire energy staves. Fire staves inflict burns with the intense heat they emit, and have a 15% chance of setting targets alight.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of frost energy staves. Frost staves inflict frostbite with the chilling air the emit, and cause hypothermia equivalent to 5% of damage dealt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of storm energy staves. Storm staves impact targets with great force, and have a 25% chance of overloading electronic circuits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of ash energy staves. Ash staves inflict multiple cuts with lacerating ash, and have a 15% chance of stunning targets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sentinal crystal creation
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows creating sentinal crystals at the energy stave table.

Sentinal crystals are multi use items attached to a belt. When activated, they will consume a charge, creating a sentinal at the targeted location.

Sentinals will automatically attack nearby enemies within a small range, until they depelete their energy and die.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. VI
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of paralytic energy staves. Paralytic staves impact their target with weakening bolts, and cause paralysis buildup equivalent to 5% of damage dealt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. VII
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of toxin energy staves. Toxin staves pierce their target with energized bolts, and cause toxic buildup equivalent to 5% of damage dealt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. VIII
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of vampiric energy staves. Vampiric staves pierce their target with draining needles, and cause blood-loss equivalent to 5% of damage dealt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. IX
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of spectral energy staves. Spectral staves sear their target with ethereal energy, and have 25% chance of causing additional damage equivalent to 25% of damage dealt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy stave creation Vol. X
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of grave energy staves. Grave staves burn their target with caustic energy, and cause armor corrosion equivalent to 5% of damage dealt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced energy stave creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of aetherial energy staves. Aetherial staves unleash blasts of pure energy, which pass through event the strongest armour with ease, and fire twice as many projectiles.
